TEXT.Russian: (CTRL: units on this plot.[NEWLINE]ALT: all units)
TEXT.English: (CTRL: units on this plot.[NEWLINE]ALT: all units)
TEXT.French: (CTRL: unités sur cette case.[NEWLINE]ALT: toutes les unités.)
TEXT.German: (STRG: Einheiten auf diesem Geländefeld[NEWLINE]ALT: alle Einheiten)
TEXT.Italian: (CTRL: unità in questa casella.[NEWLINE]ALT: tutte le unità)
TEXT.Spanish: (CTRL: units on this plot.[NEWLINE]ALT: all units)

TEXT.French: This is the current mode
TEXT.Italian: Questa è la modalità corrente

TEXT.Russian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Switch View Mode[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Choose how unit icons are displayed: single row, multiple rows, or stacked into separate rows or columns
TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Switch View Mode[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Choose how unit icons are displayed: single row, multiple rows, or stacked into separate rows or columns
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Switch View Mode[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Choose how unit icons are displayed: single row, multiple rows, or stacked into separate rows or columns
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Anzeigemethode ändern[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Auswahl der Anzeigemethode für Einheitensymbole: Einzeilig, Mehrzeilig, in Zeilen gruppiert oder in Spalten gruppiert
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cambia modalità di visualizzazione[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Scegli come vengono visualizzate le icone delle Unità: riga singola, righe multiple o gruppi di colonne o righe
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Switch View Mode[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Choose how unit icons are displayed: single row, multiple rows, or stacked into separate rows or columns

TEXT.Russian: View unit buttons in a single row
TEXT.English: View unit buttons in a single row
TEXT.French: Voir les unités de manière standard
TEXT.Italian: Visualizza le icone delle Unità nel formato a riga singola
TEXT.Spanish: View unit buttons in a single row

TEXT.Russian: View unit buttons in multiple rows
TEXT.English: View unit buttons in multiple rows
TEXT.French: Voir les unités en format multiligne
TEXT.Italian: Visualizza le icone delle Unità nel formato multilinea
TEXT.Spanish: View unit buttons in multiple rows

TEXT.Russian: View unit buttons grouped into columns
TEXT.English: View unit buttons grouped into columns
TEXT.French: Voir les unités triées verticalement
TEXT.Italian: Visualizza le icone delle Unità raggruppate in colonne
TEXT.Spanish: View unit buttons grouped into columns

TEXT.Russian: View unit buttons grouped into rows
TEXT.English: View unit buttons grouped into rows
TEXT.French: Voir les unités triées horizontalement
TEXT.Italian: Visualizza le icone delle Unità raggruppate in righe
TEXT.Spanish: View unit buttons grouped into rows

TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Reset Filters[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Show all units
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Annulla tutti i filtri[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Mostra tutte le Unità

TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Reset Filters[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Show all units
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Annulla tutti i filtri[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Mostra tutte le Unità

TEXT.Russian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Toggle Movement Filter[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Hide units that can move
TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Toggle Movement Filter[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Hide units that can move
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Toggle Movement Filter[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Hide units that can move
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cambia il filtro sul movimento[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Non mostrare le Unità che possono muoversi
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Toggle Movement Filter[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Hide units that can move

TEXT.Russian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Toggle Movement Filter[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Show units that can move
TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Toggle Movement Filter[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Show units that can move
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Toggle Movement Filter[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Show units that can move
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cambia il filtro sul movimento[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Mostra le Unità che possono muoversi
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Toggle Movement Filter[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Show units that can move

TEXT.Russian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Toggle Movement Filter[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Show only units that can move
TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Toggle Movement Filter[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Show only units that can move
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Toggle Movement Filter[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Show only units that can move
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Filter "Bewegung" aktivieren[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Nur Einheiten anzeigen, die bewegt werden können
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cambia il filtro sul movimento[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Mostra solo le Unità che possono muoversi
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Toggle Movement Filter[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Show only units that can move

TEXT.Russian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Toggle Movement Filter[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Show units that can and cannot move
TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Toggle Movement Filter[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Show units that can and cannot move
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Toggle Movement Filter[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Show units that can and cannot move

TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cambia il filtro sul movimento[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Mostra sia le Unità che possono muoversi che quelle che non possono
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Toggle Movement Filter[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Show units that can and cannot move

TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Toggle Movement Filter[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Hide units that cannot move

TEXT.Russian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Switch to Standard Mode[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]View normal unit icons and issue orders
TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Switch to Standard Mode[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]View normal unit icons and issue orders
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Switch to Standard Mode[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]View normal unit icons and issue orders
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Standardansicht aktivieren[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Anzeige der normalen Einheitensymbole und Aktionsschaltflächen
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Passa alla Modalità Standard[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Visualizza tutte le icone di Unità
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Switch to Standard Mode[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]View normal unit icons and issue orders

TEXT.Russian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Standard Mode[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Toggle how units are grouped: by unit type or selection group
TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Standard Mode[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Toggle how units are grouped: by unit type or selection group
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Standard Mode[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Toggle how units are grouped: by unit type or selection group
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Standardansicht[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Auswahl der Art der Gruppierung: nach Einheitentyp oder nach Einheitenverband
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Modalità Standard[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Cambia il raggruppamento delle Unità: per tipo o per gruppo di selezione
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Standard Mode[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Toggle how units are grouped: by unit type or selection group

TEXT.French: Sélectionner les unités par types d'unité
TEXT.Italian: Raggruppa le Unità per tipo

TEXT.French: Sélectionner les unités par groupe
TEXT.Italian: Raggruppa le Unità per gruppo di selezione

TEXT.Russian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Switch to Promotion Mode[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]View units available for promotion along with the promotions they may receive
TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Switch to Promotion Mode[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]View units available for promotion along with the promotions they may receive
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Switch to Promotion Mode[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Sélectionner les unités en attente de promotion
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Filter "Beförderung" aktivieren[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Beförderbare Einheiten und die jeweils verfügbaren Beförderungen anzeigen
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Passa alla Modalità Promozione[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Visualizza solo le Unità con possibilità di promozione (e le promozioni che possono ricevere)
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Switch to Promotion Mode[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]View units available for promotion along with the promotions they may receive

TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Promotion Mode[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Switch back to Standard Mode
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Modalità Promozione[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Torna alla Modalità Standard

TEXT.Russian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Switch to Upgrade Mode[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]View units available for upgrade along with the units they may become
TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Switch to Upgrade Mode[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]View units available for upgrade along with the units they may become
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Switch to Upgrade Mode[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Sélectionner les unités pouvant être améliorées
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Filter "Modernisierung" aktivieren[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Modernisierbare Einheiten und die jeweils verfügbaren Einheiten, zu denen sie modernisiert werden können, anzeigen
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Passa alla Modalità Avanzamento[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Visualizza solo le Unità con possibilità di avanzamento (e le Unità a cui possono avanzare)
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Switch to Upgrade Mode[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]View units available for upgrade along with the units they may become

TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Upgrade Mode[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Switch back to Standard Mode
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Modalità Avanzamento[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Torna alla Modalità Standard
